name: jan-ai-assistant
title: Jan AI Assistant
description: Process text, perform quick actions, and create reminders using Jan.ai
author: michael_derham

commands.name: process-text
commands.title: Process with Jan.ai
commands.description: Process selected text with Jan.ai AI assistant

arguments.name: text
arguments.placeholder: Text to process (optional - uses clipboard if empty)

commands.name: quick-actions
commands.title: Jan.ai Quick Actions
commands.description: Quick AI actions on selected text

commands.name: create-reminder
commands.title: Create Reminder from Text
commands.description: Parse text with Jan.ai and create a reminder in Apple Reminders

arguments.name: text
arguments.placeholder: e.g., 'Call dentist tomorrow' or 'Electric bill $150 due Jan 15'

commands.name: reminders-to-csv
commands.title: Convert Reminders to CSV
commands.description: Parse reminders text and convert to CSV table with expenses and income separated

commands.name: create-reminder-from-pdf-direct
commands.title: Create Reminder from PDF
commands.description: Process PDF invoices - supports file selection and clipboard paste (⌘C file in Finder)

commands.name: process-pdf-native
commands.title: Process PDF with Jan.ai
commands.description: Send PDFs to Jan.ai for tasks, summaries, or custom queries - supports clipboard paste (⌘C file)

preferences.name: reminderList
preferences.title: Reminder List Name
preferences.description: Apple Reminders list to add tasks to
